title: Bridging Finance investors to lose $1.3-billion after sale process terminated because of unsatisfactory bids - The Globe and Mail
content: Bridging Finance investors to lose $1.3-billion after sale process terminated because of unsatisfactory bids  The Globe and Mail
description: Bridging Finance Inc.â€™s investors will lose an estimated $1.3-billion under a final proposal to scrap selling the private lender in favour of winding down its troubled loan portfolio
